title: (x) hi-contrast display serif / another font puzzle - Pistilli Roman/Eloquent {Tiffany, Paul S}
content:
Hello all,

wondering if you could help identify this font?!  
looks similar to Didot??

Thanks!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113853im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6738.png)
author: Alisha Henson

comments.content:
Argh, nevermind. :-)

But it IS a Bodoni rather than a Didot.

aaaah, yes! Thanks Tiffany!  
I did a search and found another thread for Pistalli Roman and found [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113853/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_didoni_normal)
